Otterlo, Hoge Veluwe

Boerderij
Voorste Eng

Luxury holiday homes in the heart of Otterlo

View offer

Peace & Nature

Boerderij Voorste Eng is more than a stay. It is your home base on the Veluwe. Located in the heart of Otterlo, within walking distance of National Park De Hoge Veluwe, our renovated farmhouse offers a perfect mix of luxury, comfort, and nature.

1 km
Hoge Veluwe
Privacy
Private terrace
1 km away

Right next to Hoge Veluwe

Within minutes you are surrounded by nature. Enjoy the endless heathlands, forests, and sand drifts of National Park De Hoge Veluwe.

Discover more
New (2025)

Luxury comfort & Atmosphere

Your own oasis of peace in our stylishly renovated barn. The apartments feature a luxury kitchen, boxspring beds, and a private terrace.

Discover more
Center

Heart of Otterlo

Located in the cozy center of Otterlo, with restaurants, shops, and the Kröller-Müller Museum around the corner. Free parking on site.

Your Host

Welcome to Otterlo

"Enjoy peace and space in our renovated farmhouse. With the Hoge Veluwe as our backyard, we are happy to give you the best tips for a relaxing stay in nature."
